main.java.entities

Class Archive

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.entities.Archive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlledScreen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateMenuController, CreateTask, EditTask, FileListController, LoginController, ToDoController

    public abstract class Archive
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControlledScreen
    Archive is the class that contains most, if not all, of the methods related to serialization and data storage.
    Author:
    Gabriel Freire
